name: Aiden Roskelley
bio: Software developer and problem solver with a passion for building tools that make life easier. I combine my technical background in mechanical technologies with modern programming skills to create practical, user-focused applications.

experiences.description: Managed warehouse logistics and inventory organization for a sustainable packaging company.
highlights: Operated forklifts safely with zero incidents
Trained 3 new team members on equipment operation

experiences.description: Performed MIG and TIG welding for custom fencing and metal fabrication projects.
highlights: Fabricated custom residential and commercial fencing
Maintained welding equipment and ensured safety compliance
Completed projects ahead of schedule with minimal rework

experiences.description: Building personal projects and automation tools while completing my degree.
highlights: Developed TheFoundry - a suite of content generators
Created resume website generator used by classmates
Built automation scripts to streamline repetitive tasks

education.description: Focused on software engineering, algorithms, and practical application development. Active participant in coding clubs and hackathons. Maintaining a strong GPA while working part-time.

Technical high school in Las Vegas specializing in hands-on mechanical and technical education. Gained practical skills in welding, fabrication, and mechanical systems that complement my software development work.

projects.title: TheFoundry
projects.description: A growing collection of content generators and task automation programs. TheFoundry is my personal toolkit for automating repetitive tasks and generating content quickly. It includes this very resume generator!

projects.title: ResumeGen
projects.description: A command-line tool that generates beautiful, responsive resume websites from user input or JSON data. Supports multiple templates, custom themes, and produces clean HTML/CSS output ready for deployment.

projects.title: DARCI
projects.description: An ambitious personal project currently in development. Details are classified, but it involves AI integration and natural language processing. Stay tuned for updates!

projects.title: Inventory Tracker
projects.description: A simple but effective inventory management system I built to help track parts and materials. Features barcode scanning support and generates reports for reordering.
